name: Germbusters
description:
When there are germs in your body, who you gonna call? Germbusters! As a member of the Germbusters you have 1 minute to shoot the germs infecting this poor man to make him healthy again. But make sure to avoid the lungs and heart or he will die.  The more you shoot the more points you get and the healthier the man is.

Mouse to move the crosshair and click to shoot.  Title screen music by my brother and level music from Free Music Archive. Sounds from freesound.org. Assets from https://opengameart.org/.

Hope you enjoy!
